dct_title_s: Mappa dell' America Settentrionale : ove sono rappresentati esattam. i paesi e loro limiti controversi che hanno dato motivo alla guerra presente fra la Francia e l'Inghilterra
dct_description_sm: Shows eastern United States and southeastern Canada. Relief shown pictorially. Attributed to: Jacques Nicolas Bellin. Described in: New England in early printed maps, 1513 to 1800 / Barbara B. McCorkle. 2001. p. 147. Includes notes.
dct_subject_sm: United States—History—French and Indian War, 1754-1763—Maps—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: United States—History—French and Indian War, 1754-1763—Maps—Early works to 1800
